ComicInfo.Title: Universal Law, Book One: Visions
ComicInfo.Summary:
A new art team debuts with Part 1 of the 3-part "Universal Law." Inhaling large quantities of toxic gases would be a bad idea for most people, but surely not a super-hero like Mr. Majestic. He could inhale those gases and expel them in the vacuum of space. No problem...right? Right? A super-hero cliche is turned on its head in MR. MAJESTIC #7, Part 1 of the 3-part "Universal Law." Written by the popular MR. MAJESTIC team of Joe Casey and Brian Holguin, the issue also marks the debut of the series' ultra-cool new art team of Eric Canete (SUPERMAN 80- PAGE GIANT #2; designer, Aeon Flux) and Juan Vlasco (Cable). To save Times Square from an airborne toxin, Mr. Majestic sucks it into his mighty lungs, planning to exhale it out of harm's way in the void. But the journey into space with the toxin inside him causes Majestic to have mysterious and surreal hallucinations, which will have serious consequences for our hero.
